sentences.english: Accordingly, the war took place in the Wei Chi Yanhuang downstream to the southern Shanxi to this area.
sentences.chinese: 據此，炎黃蚩戰爭發生在渭水下游至晉南這一地區。

sentences.english: Don't ask the pedestrians, to the east country flow.
sentences.chinese: 行人莫問當年事，故國東來渭水流。
